Class GridMap

java.lang.Object
com.orasaari.GridMap
public class GridMap extends Object
The 2D grid map representation class.

  • Constructor Details

    • GridMap

      GridMap(int width, int height, double blockProb)

    • GridMap

      GridMap(String filename)
      Intialize a map from a file.
      Parameters:
      filename - name of the .map file

  • Method Details

    • getGrid

      boolean[][] getGrid()
      Get the array representation of the map.

    • calculateTraversability

      private void calculateTraversability()
      Calculate traversability to the neighbourg nodes. Only thight cornering rules are allowed anymore.

    • getWidth

      int getWidth()
      Returns:
      The width of the map, or -1 if the map is not initialized.

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      Returns:
      The height of the map, or -1 if the map is not initialized.

    • randomize

      void randomize(double blockProb)
      An utility method to create a random map. Used for testing.
      Parameters:
      blockProb - The probability of a node being blocked in randomization.

    • isTraversable

      boolean isTraversable(int x, int y, int directionX, int directionY)
      Evaluate if the map is traversable to the diection (directionX, directionY). Only applicable only for neighbourg nodes.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the node
      y - y coordinate of the node
      directionX - x component of the movement (-1, 0, 1)
      directionYy - component of the movement (-1, 0, 1)
      Returns:

    • isTraversable

      boolean isTraversable(int x, int y, int directionCode)
      Evaluate if the map is traversable to the direction code that is mapping to the traversability matrix. This method is applicable only for the adjacent nodes.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the node
      y - y coordinate of the node
      directionCode - direction code in traversability matrix
      Returns:

    • isBlocked

      boolean isBlocked(int x, int y)
      Return information if the grid in the map is blocked or outside grid
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate in the grid
      y - the y coordinate in the grid
      Returns:
      true, if (x,y) is outside the grid or blocked

    • getDirection

      int getDirection(int directionX, int directionY)
      Map direction given in coordinates to the numeric direction code mapping to the traversability array indices.
      Parameters:
      directionX - x component of the movement (-1, 0, 1)
      directionY - y component of the movement (-1, 0, 1)
      Returns:
      The numeric direction code mapping to the traversability matrix.

    • loadMapFile

      private boolean[][] loadMapFile(String filename)
      Load a a file from a disc. Only Moving AI lab .map files are supported.
      Parameters:
      file - The file in the local file system.
      Returns:
      The GridMap object representing the map, or null in case of any error.
